Package edu.mines.csci598.recycler.backend

Interface Summary
AudioSource Represents a source of audio data, conforming to AudioPlayer.FORMAT.
Destroyable Describes a resource that needs to be manually released.
InputDriver Describes an object which can convert external stimuli into InputEvents.
InputReceiver Interface for clases which can process input events.
 

Class Summary
AudioPlayer Performs mixing of audio and logical inversion of the audio system.
AWTInputDriver Provides base functionality for input drivers which interact with the AWT.
ButtonGestureInputDriver Base class for input drivers which translate button/key press events into gesture events.
GameManager The GameManager manages resources and system compatibility, and orchestrates interactions between different components.
GameState Encapsulates a "state" of the game.
HandTracker  
InputEvent Describes a single input event.
InputStatus Describes the state of the abstracted input system.
KeyboardGestureInputDriver Input driver which maps keyboard press events into gesture events.
ModalMouseMotionInputDriver Input driver which translates mouse motion into pointer and/or body control.
MouseButtonGestureInputDriver Input driver which translates mouse button events into gestures.
OpenNIContextSingleton Singleton class that handles access to the openNI context.
OpenNIHandTrackerInputDriver Tracks hands as pointers from OpenNI.
PictureRGB Takes pictures using the kinect.
PictureRGBApplication Run this as main to take a picture using the kinect and display it to the screen.
ScreenManager The ScreenManager class manages initializing and displaying full screen graphics modes.
SoundEffect Manages a collection of sound effects -- commonly-played, short audio samples stored in raw (unformatted) files.
